definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The Rocky Mountains have rugged mountains and roads.
sentences.chinese: 落基山脈有崇山峻嶺和崎嶇不平的道路。

sentences.english: Why, we'll be in sight of the Northern mountains then.
sentences.chinese: 晤，然後我們就會望見北方的崇山峻嶺。

sentences.english: Baokang County, Hubei Province in China, everywhere that is the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 在湖北省保康縣，到處都是這樣的崇山峻嶺。

sentences.english: South Kaiyuan hole located at the Kaiyuan city south under approximately 10 kilometers high mountain ridges.
sentences.chinese: 開遠南洞位於開遠市南約10公里的崇山峻嶺之下。

sentences.english: Orchid Pavilion is rounded by mighty mountains, trees are flourishing, and bamboos are dense.
sentences.chinese: 蘭亭這地方有崇山峻嶺環抱，林木繁茂，竹篁幽密。

sentences.english: Basha Miao Village is lying quietly, like a green leaf in the deep mountains.
sentences.chinese: 岜沙苗寨像一片綠葉靜靜的臥在崇山峻嶺深處。

sentences.english: Along the way are remote mountains, deep valleys, so green, so beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 沿途崇山峻嶺，溝谷深陷，綠水青山，美輪美奐。

sentences.english: The Chinese Rock Penjing pictured is made up of Phillite rock, up to 30" high, resting on a 40" white marble tray.
sentences.chinese: 高聳的岩石組合成崇山峻嶺安放在潔白大理石盤之上。

sentences.english: It is surrounded by mountains on three sides, altitude 2483 meters.
sentences.chinese: 它三面被崇山峻嶺環抱，海拔2483米。

sentences.english: After climbing across the toweringly steep mountains, our army finally reached their destination.
sentences.chinese: 隊伍翻越崇山峻嶺，終於到達了目的地。

definition: Qilian county in Haibei Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海北藏族自治州[Hai3 bei3 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
topography of a mountain/features of a mountain
strategically situated and easy to defend/strategic location
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
